page.title: 14Punkey Night in 1985
page.content: Nowadays our children collect money by selling 5 penny tickets in the village and those who sell the most become Punkie King and Queen, Prince and Princess for a year. On punkie night the winners are driven through the street on a decorated float pulled by a tractor. The other children carry lanterns behind, which are made to look like faces called 'Punkies' and singing a song. Later at the village hall, the king, queen, prince and princess are crowned and the punkies are judged and prizes given. Games and fun follow this. Money is collected.
